alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 12:57PM MST until August 13 at 3:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR ASH CREEK IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 1254 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Ash Creek. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.25 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is likely ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Powell Springs CG and Powell Springs Campground. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Cienega Creek, Yarber Wash, Ash Creek, Cherry Creek, Little Hackberry Wash, Hackberry Wash, Osborne Spring Wash and Racetrack Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
